ch0109_00_kudari/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Your smile is
always the best. Perfect!
ch0109_00_kudari/0101_0701_02_10:
Whenever I see you, I can’t help but smile, too!
I’ll have to make sure my smile is just as good
as yours!
ch0109_00_kudari/7101_0701_01_10:
I like Double Battles when I’m on the
Battle Subway.
ch0109_00_kudari/7101_0701_02_10:
I like to see the different combinations of Trainers
and Pokémon.
ch0109_00_kudari/7101_0701_03_10:
Here on Pasio, you battle in teams of three. The
addition of a third sync pair means there are more
strategies and combinations to consider!
ch0109_00_kudari/7101_0701_04_10:
Pokémon battles are a lot more interesting and
complex than I originally thought!
ch0109_00_kudari/7102_0701_01_10:
The Battle Subway transports our important
passengers to where they need to go!
ch0109_00_kudari/7102_0701_02_10:
That’s why no matter how intense their battles
get, we don’t mind at all!
ch0109_00_kudari/7102_0701_03_10:
The subway is built strong enough to withstand all
of that! Pretty impressive, huh?
ch0109_00_kudari/7103_0701_01_10:
I’m proud of this uniform! Anyone who sees me
wearing it knows immediately that I’m a
Subway Boss!
ch0109_00_kudari/7103_0701_02_10:
Although it makes me proud, it does come with a
lot of responsibility.
ch0109_00_kudari/7103_0701_03_10:
As a Subway Boss, I have to make sure I look
cool while wearing this uniform! I can’t afford
to lose!
ch0109_00_kudari/7103_0701_04_10:
Wearing it gets me motivated, of course! It also
makes me stand up straight and tall!
ch0109_00_kudari/7104_0701_01_10:
I secretly dream of building a Battle Subway line
that connects Nimbasa City to Pasio.
ch0109_00_kudari/7104_0701_02_10:
I think if the sync pairs here on Pasio could ride
our Battle Subway, we’d all have a blast!
ch0109_00_kudari/7104_0701_03_10:
I wonder if we can get the owner of Pasio to
consider looking into it!
ch0109_00_kudari/7105_0701_01_10:
Your final destination is even higher than the top
of Pasio, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0109_00_kudari/7105_0701_02_10:
You’re on a super express zooming straight for
your destination!
ch0109_00_kudari/7105_0701_03_10:
But sometimes, it can be fun to get off the train
to explore other stops along the way.
ch0109_00_kudari/7105_0701_04_10:
I think it’s important to get a change of scenery
every once in a while. That applies to traveling
by train and life in general!
ch0109_00_kudari/1701_0701_02_10: I have a present for you. Here, take it!
ch0109_00_kudari/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s important to be well prepared when you’re
out and about! Better safe than sorry!
ch0109_00_kudari/2501_0701_01_10:
Do you have any siblings? I have an older
brother, Ingo.
ch0109_00_kudari/2501_0701_02_10:
He’s verrrry strong. He hardly ever loses in
Pokémon battles.
ch0109_00_kudari/2501_0701_03_10:
Even though I also hold the title of Subway Boss, I
really look up to him.
ch0109_00_kudari/2501_0702_01_10:
Ingo and I are twins. We’re both Subway Bosses,
and we’re each other’s closest rival!
ch0109_00_kudari/2501_0702_02_10:
We always challenge each other to get better.
That’s the kind of relationship we have!
ch0109_00_kudari/2501_0702_03_10: It’s always a lot of fun when we’re together!
ch0109_00_kudari/2511_0701_01_10:
Have you ever thought about why you battle with
your Pokémon?
ch0109_00_kudari/2511_0701_02_10:
I like Pokémon battles. And I like winning more
than anything else.
ch0109_00_kudari/2511_0701_04_10:
My favorite thing to do is to win with the best
partner and the best team!
ch0109_00_kudari/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s best to be serious during Pokémon battles.
Ever since I joined your team, I’ve had numerous
opportunities to do that.
ch0109_00_kudari/2511_0702_02_10:
Winning a serious, hard-fought battle is the best
feeling in the world!
ch0109_00_kudari/2511_0702_03_10:
That’s why I’m always serious about battling—to
thank everyone for doing their best!
ch0109_00_kudari/2511_0702_04_10:
Let me know if you ever come to visit the Battle
Subway! I’ll show you my appreciation with a
serious battle!
ch0109_00_kudari/3001_0701_01_10:
The beginning of the day is very important.
Make sure to conduct your safety checks.
ch0109_00_kudari/3003_0701_01_10:
I’d rather have a Pokémon battle than take a nap.
That’s just my standard operating procedure!
ch0109_00_kudari/3005_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I have so much fun Pokémon battling,
I almost miss the last train!
